name: Dino Shooter (Made1207)
description:
Why would I make such a random game?

So for the past few years, every few months, I would randomly remember this game I used to play a lot with family when I was younger where you had a certain amount of time to shoot down as many dinosaurs as you can. However, I never ever found the game and it seemed like it had disappeared off the face of the Earth.

So I decided, despite never making a 3D game or using Unity before, I would remake this game in 3D using Unity in 3 weeks. And I just managed to accomplish that and I'm really proud of it for my first game.

**Here are some special screenshots**

You have 90 seconds to shoot down as many dinosaurs as you can. 

**Hint**

Bigger dinosaurs give you more points.

Well, enjoy!
